trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Anderson
There were no other sightings in Anderson on or around March 7th 2011
Summary: Two lights move across sky, then go straight up and disappear.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my front porch talking with my neighbor when we noticed two small lights moving across the sky slowly from west to east. The second light was following the first at a distance that was too close to be airplanes, matching it's speed exactly. After about a minute, the first light went straight up and disappeared, when the second one got to the same spot in the sky it went rtaight up and disappeared also.
